channel.title: Computational Neuroscience on John S Butler
channel.description: Recent content in Computational Neuroscience on John S Butler

item.title: Computational Neuroscience
item.description: This is an ongoing, possibly sisyphus, project in which I am writing iPython notebooks of mathematical models in Neuroscience. These notebooks will be interactive webpages to illustrate and hopefully demystify the different mathematical models notebooks.
